FuncDef: This command enables the router to use the configured IP address as the tunnel source IP address (source VTEP) when originating VXLAN-encapsulated frames for this service. This IP address is also used to set the BGP NLRI next hop in EVPN route advertisements for the service.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the non-system IPv4 address that terminates VXLAN for a service.
Specifies the IPv6 address that terminates VXLAN for a service.
